-| wi(wa(wcel(cin(c0, c1), cch), wcel(c1, cch)), wb(wbr(cin(c0, c1), ccv, c1), wbr(cfv(cort, c1), ccv, cfv(cort, cin(c0, c1)))))

body.origin: |- wi(wa(wcel(cin(c0, c1), cch), wcel(c1, cch)), wb(wbr(cin(c0, c1), ccv, c1), wbr(cfv(cort, c1), ccv, cfv(cort, cin(c0, c1)))))

cumulated.origin:
|- wb(wbr(cin(c0, c1), ccv, c1), wbr(c0, ccv, co(c0, chj, c1)))
-| wcel(c0, cch)
-| wcel(c1, cch)

comment: The Hilbert lattice satisfies the exchange axiom. Proposition 1(iii) of [Kalmbach] p. 140 and its converse. Originally proved by Garrett Birkhoff in 1933. (Contributed by NM, 12-Jun-2004.) (New usage is discouraged.)
